explains: n. 结霜；霜状白糖；无光泽面；去光泽
v. 以霜覆盖；冻坏；起霜（frost 的 ing 形式）
adj. 结霜的；磨砂的；消光的

sentences.en: She was frosting the cupcakes while we talked.
sentences.cn: 我们交谈时，她在给杯形蛋糕撒糖霜。

sentences.en: I used practically a whole bottle of red dye in the frosting, which in earlier days would appall me.
sentences.cn: 我几乎用了一整瓶的红色染料来做糖霜，这在早些时候会让我感到害怕。

sentences.en: Bake a cake and use frosting to write "I'm Sorry" on top.
sentences.cn: 烤一个蛋糕，并用糖霜在上面写“对不起”。
